answers.answer: I think a stomach would become workacholic rather than lazy after food poisoning. :)Lazy stomach is a result of either a nerve non-responsiveness, or nerve or arterial impairment (often in diabetes), obstruction of gastric outflow (stricture), hormonal impairment (hypothyroidism), some medicins (Reglan...), systemic sclerosis...Stomach layziness is also called gastroparesis.Most often is functional layzy stomach, which goes with lazy colon what causes terrible constipation.

question: Can food poisoning caused by raw lobster cause a person to have a Lazy Stomach?
title: Lazy Stomach
